testcase.name: Given To initiate Rest service to get country details with code as "IN"
testcase.classname: Scenario: To verify Rest service - GET Method

testcase.name: Then Respose status code should be "200"
testcase.classname: Scenario: To verify Rest service - GET Method

testcase.name: And response should includes the following
testcase.classname: Scenario: To verify Rest service - GET Method
